name: Time Like These
description: Home may be where you grew up,home can be a person, home is actually where you feel good and safe. The Game as you know must have been made in 48 hours. So It's not perfect. But the main idea is that this little boy is actually a grown up man who has his own house,own family now. By chance he found out a box full of old stuff, and old pictures of him. It made him remember his childhood and his teenagehood , his first love ( who became his wife ! yeah happy story ) and his old house. How to play: Level 1 : " Tidy home" The title speaks for itself. You need to tidy the house . And you're a little child. Children tend to put their hands in their mouth , so after cleaning ( only after cleaning) , what should you do? Level 2 : " Where I met her" . Yes he's supposed to be a teenager but you know, lack of time and stuff .. so .. you're stuck with the little boy for now. :D So what's the level about? He's at school, and he has a crush. Cute right? He wanna give her something, so he has to put it in her locker.. Which one is hers? Find out. ( Look for clues in everything) Level 3: " Scared of the dark" . You're in your bedroom but it's so dark there.. so turn on the lights. :) (Clues? There are 3 light sources in there. Find them and turn them on ). That's it ! have fun ! C&C are welcome!
